original_text: They must mix it with oil and they must cook it on a flat plate. Then they must break it into pieces and they must offer it to the Lord. The smell of it will give the Lord pleasure.
korean_text: 그것을 기름으로 반죽하여 철판에 굽고 기름에 적셔 썰어서 소제로 여호와께 드려 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: They must mix it with oil
and they must cook it on a flat plate
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 평평한 접시에서 그것을 요리해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then they must break it into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그들은 그것을 조각으로 부숴야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and they must offer it to the Lord
